summary.para: Contains interfaces and classes that are specific to XAF ASP.NET Core Blazor applications.
Contains classes and interfaces that allow you to configure your ASP.NET Core Blazor application in the fluent API-based application builder.
Extends the interface with methods to configure authentication in your application.

summary.para: Lists user actions that open a Detail View opens from a .
A double click on a row opens the Detail View.
A single click on a row opens the Detail View.

The Static Text View Item used in XAF ASP.NET Core Blazor applications.
